item.title: COVID and Santander bikes
item.description: COVID and its effect on bike rentals A very common (and pleasant) sight in London are its Santander bikes which can be rented fairly cheap and be ridden all around the city. This data science project will analyze how the development in bike rentals have progressed over the past couple of years and in particular how COVID affected the number of rentals during the lockdown. To help us with the analysis, let us first load the following packages.
